description: Christopher Wil Brogg Saillune is a prince of the Kingdom of Saillune, and second in line for the throne. He is the younger brother of Philionel El Di Saillune, and the older brother of Randionel Saillune. Their father, Eldoran Saillune, is the current king. Christopher has one son, Alfred Saillune, who is deceased.
name: Christopher Wil Brogg Saillune
